alert.note: Alert for Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:53PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WYANDOTTE...LEAVENWORTH AND NORTHWESTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 251 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Valley Falls to Williamstown to Richland, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. 70 to 80 mph wind has been reported in Jefferson County Kansas. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Edgerton, Linwood, Easton, Reno, Clearview City, Lowemont and Jarbalo. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 223. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
